entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 14.
